text: Rewiti Pomare Kingi "Pita" Paraone (30 November 1945 â€“ 26 August 2019) was a New Zealand politician. He was Chairman of the Waitangi National Trust Board. He was a member of the New Zealand First party. Paraone was a member of the New Zealand Parliament from 2002 to 2008 and again from 2014 through 2017. Paraone was born in Kawakawa, New Zealand. Paraone died on 26 August 2019 at a hospital in Auckland from heart surgery-related problems at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== *Current parliamentary biography for Pita Paraone Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:New Zealand politicians
title: Pita Paraone
